Condition.Diagnostic: Select Data/Address in the Pinout view.

RefParameter.Name: NandPageSize1
RefParameter.Description: NAND memory page size (without spare area) measured in bytes for 8-bit addressing or words for 16-bit addressing.

RefParameter.Name: NandSpareAreaSize1
RefParameter.Description: NAND memory spare area size measured in bytes for 8-bit addressing or words for 16-bit addressing.

RefParameter.Name: NandBlockSize1
RefParameter.Description: NAND memory block size expressed in number of pages.

RefParameter.Name: NandPlaneSize1
RefParameter.Description: NAND memory plane size measured in number of blocks.

RefParameter.Name: NandExtraCommandEnable1
RefParameter.Description: NAND extra command needed for page reading mode. This parameter is mandatory for some NAND memories. Please check the read mode sequence in the NAND device datasheet.

Condition.Diagnostic: To disable the wait feature, switch to the Pinout view and disable the corresponding NAND 1 wait mode.
To enable the wait feature, switch to the Pinout view and enable the corresponding NAND 1 wait mode.

RefParameter.Comment: CLE low to RE low delay in HCLK cycles
RefParameter.Name: TCLRSetupTime1

RefParameter.Comment: ALE low to RE low delay in HCLK cycles

Condition.Diagnostic: Memory type should be multiplexed NOR Flash or multiplexed PSRAM
Only for NOR Flash and PSRAM
Only for NOR Flash and PSRAM
Only for PSRAM with either asynchronous read and synchronous write accesses or synchronous read and asynchronous write accesses
Only for NOR Flash, PSRAM and SRAM

Only for NOR Flash and PSRAM
